author: costin
msg: Getter with the same name as in servlet api, to make it easier to convert servlets to adapters

author: costin
msg: Abstract JMX out, allow other frameworks to be plugged in.
This is pretty early, will need to be reviewed/improved, but it gets the job done.
( JMX may not be available or needed for some embedded apps )

author: costin
msg: Copy of Mapper, with File instead of JNDI.
Ideally Mapper should extend this and override few methods - will do this if the file is accepted to the
( JNDI is not available on some platforms - android for example )

author: tkirby
msg: ${pom.version} does not get expanded by assembly filtering :-(, so use a filtered version from earlier in the build.
